Trial_Design.evidence: We randomized male F344 rats into 5 groups

Intervention.evidence: cis-fib+10 Gy IR (n = 6), and cis-fib+20 Gy IR (n = 9)

Objective.evidence: Objective: To test the safety and efficacy of combination treatment for pleural mesothelioma

Method_Outcome.evidence: compared to IR alone (mean tumor growth, 252% vs 539%; P = .04)

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: We randomized male F344 rats into 5 groups

Number_Randomised.evidence: cis-fib (n = 9), 10 Gy IR (n = 6), 20 Gy IR (n = 9), cis-fib+10 Gy IR (n = 6), and cis-fib+20 Gy IR (n = 9)

Harms.evidence: We observed only short-term side effects related to 20 Gy radiotherapy
